metadata.title: CVE-2019-10054 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Suricata 4.1.3. The functionprocess_reply_record_v3 lacks a check for the length of reply.data. Itcauses an invalid memory access and the program crashes within thenfs/nfs3.rs file.

criterions.comment: suricata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
